testbed_description: Test the compliance of a DRS implementation with GA4GH DRS v1.2.0 specification

phases.phase_description: run all the tests for service_info endpoint

tests.test_description: validate service-info status code, content-type and response schemas
tests.message: Stopping the report as the implemented DRS version can not be obtained from the service-info endpoint

cases.case_description: check if the response status code is 200
check if the content-type is application/json
validate service-info response schema when status = 200
